official_title: To authorize the Secretary of the Interior to enter into a contract for the delivery of water from the New Melones Unit of the Central Valley Project, California.

summary.text: Authorizes the Secretary of the Interior to enter into a long-term contract with the Toulumne Regional Water District, California, for the delivery of water from the New Melones project to the county's water distribution system.

titles.title: To authorize the Secretary of the Interior to enter into a contract for the delivery of water from the New Melones Unit of the Central Valley Project, California.
